DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the diagnostic performance of two-dimensional shear-wave elastography (SWE) for staging hepatic fibrosis in the background liver parenchyma in patients with liver tumors before hepatic resection, using resected tissue pathology as a reference standard.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Hepatic Fibrosis by Shear Wave Elastography in Patients With Liver Malignancy: A Prospective Single-center Study
